titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hoeven. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs for the 115th Congress.
